name: Sesame
0:
”Alexa, lock the door.”
”Alexa, is the door locked?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill will allow you to ask Alexa to lock Sesame or to tell Sesame's status. 
To use this Sesame skill, you will need to download and install the Sesame app and create an account. You must pair your Sesame with a WiFi Module.
If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us at sesame@candyhouse.co
